title: Interpretation of the difficulty of opening a door in a dream

preview.html: A door in a dream indicates the owner of the house or his guardian, just as the door indicates a guard. Open doors are a function of livelihood. House doors are often interpreted for women. If the doors are new, they indicate virgins, and if the doors are open, they indicate virgins. Difficulty opening the door in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream difficulty opening the door, may face some dilemmas in his waking life. If he is able to open the door in a dream, then in his waking life He will overcome these dilemmas and overcome them. Just as the door in the dream shows the dreamer’s infallibility, safety, integrity, and immunity, so in a married woman’s dream, it symbolizes her husband, and in a girl’s dream, it symbolizes the father, so what the woman sees in the door. It can have the meaning of a husband or father. Interpretation of the door in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi They indicated the interpretation: If a person dreams that he closed an iron door, then he will marry a virgin girl. Whoever sees the door of the house changing from its condition, this means a change in the status of the owner of the house and its owner. If he sees that the door has fallen, fallen out of place, or was struck by fire, then this indicates turmoil or a predicament in that house. A closed door A tightly closed door is a sign of safety. And peace to her family. A closed door indicates crises and obstacles. The small door shows the boy to the owner of the house. The large door, as for the greatness of the door, shows the greatness of the owner of the house, and if the door looks good in the dream, this indicates an improvement in the situation. Whoever sees in a dream that someone has opened the door of his house or classroom, then when he wakes up he fears for himself and his household that some of his secrets will be revealed. Find the DoorAs for whoever sees in a dream that he is searching for the door of his house and does not find it, then he is confused about his matter. As for the one who sees in his dream as if he entered through a wide door, he will receive an abundance of livelihood. And whoever dreams in his dream that the doors are opened for him, then the world approaches him, and sees in him all the goodness and all the blessings descending from him. Whoever sees in his dream that the door of his house has grown, he will receive many guests or will stay at home to celebrate a happy occasion. Other than the door, it is better at interpreting and interpreting dreams, as the doors change their places or positions, because such visions express the change of the owner of the house in his morals and circumstances. . Perhaps a change in the position of the door indicates a change of residence, and at other times it indicates migration or travel. And whoever sees in his dream that he is exiting through a narrow door and sees after it a wide and spacious place, then he will emerge from the narrowness or narrowness. Interpretation of the door ring in a dream and the door part in the interpretation meanings There are many, some of which indicate receiving news and others indicate the return of the arrival. He came up with an interpretation that whoever sees in his dream that it has a door made of two rings, then he owes two people. And whoever dreams in his dream that the ring on his door is broken or cut off, then he fears for himself from deviations and heresies. And whoever sees in his dream that fire is consuming the door of his house, then he will fall into... A dispute with his wife. As for the city gate or its gate, it indicates the prince, ruler, or governor, while the city gate indicates the facade of the mosque. The Unknown Door. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is entering a place

title: Interpretation of beard hair loss in a dream

preview.html: Some men see that beard hair in a dream can be interpreted as bad, especially since it is a sign of prestige and masculinity for them, but we cannot judge the vision in general, especially because it varies from person to person and from one case. In the other, it can be interpreted as good or bad depending on the condition of the dreamer, so together we will learn more than one interpretation from the leading scholars. Of nutrition, money, prestige and dignity, and the dream is interpreted as getting rid of competition and solving problems. If the dreamer sees that he is holding the hair of his beard in his hand and it falls from his hands, this is a sign of the loss of his money, but it has not returned to her neck. Dreaming of keeping the beard in a dream indicates a state of anxiety and tension. For fear of impotence, and whoever has a long beard and sees himself pulling it, this is a sign of approaching life or remorse. Because of the sins he committed.. As for whoever sees someone holding his beard without pain, this is evidence that insight runs after that person in all his affairs. And whoever sees in his dream that his beard is missing and thin, and if he owes it to him, he will return it, and if it becomes overwhelming, his sadness will go away, and he will pick up his beard. And he cuts the amount of his fist, then he is a man who pays zakat on his money, and as for whoever sees that he cuts someone else’s beard, this dream symbolizes an increase in his money or his son, and God knows best. And whoever sees that he is plucking his beard, this is a sign of money spoiling in his hands, and whoever sees that the hair on his head and his beard Two shaves together while he is actually sick. He is cured, but if he has to pay the debt, but if he is worried, his anxiety will go away. Hair falling out on the chin in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the hair of his beard is falling out, this may be interpreted as corruption in the morals of the dreamer, or a sign that he is a liar. Unfaithful to his promise, and who also dreams of having his hair. If his chin falls, this indicates his nudity, but if he sees that the hair of his beard is falling out, but without decreasing, then this symbolizes gain and loss in his life. And whoever sees his beard long, taking care of it and selling it in the market, then he bears false witness, and whoever is sad and cuts his beard will prolong his sadness and anxiety. The beard symbolizes oaths and honesty. . , falsehood, miserliness and generosity, gray and white beards indicate weakness or illness. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss in a dream in detail Dream interpretation service within 24 hours

title: Interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansThe interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream by the scientific interpreter Al-Nabulsi differs as a victory over enemies from the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, who sees prison as a torment for the infidel and a warning to the believer against some of the sins that hinder him. Of entering Paradise, Al-Nabulsi said: If you see yourself as a prisoner, it means victory over enemies, or liberation from evil in the eyes of envious people, and above the consequences of imprisonment and captivity, we offer you the following: Interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream. Breaking the protection means allowing yourself to control desires. And staying away from sins. Seeing a prisoner being released in a dream is good, and it means that some fears will be released and fears will disappear. Dreaming of escaping from prison while you are being chased by dogs means that you are being chased by enemies and envy. The interpretation of seeing a prisoner behind bars who is unjustly imprisoned means that he is being subjected to extreme cruelty. From around you. A dream about getting out of prison: To see a prisoner escaping from his prison, either by escaping or leaving it, is a good omen. It is evidence of his success in disciplining him from what is harming him, and his superiority over his hateful self and the evil that he commands him to do. Drifts away. From the path of truth, which is one of the most difficult challenges that a person goes through, and this is the message of his success in overcoming himself. Interpretation of a dream about a prisoner for a married woman: seeing a prisoner outside the prison and that prisoner was your husband, then this vision has distinct connotations, if your husband was imprisoned one day and you saw him in a dream and he was His appearance is beautiful and happy, which means that he will soon be acquitted, and it is a promising vision that her husband is right and that the accusations against him are false. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning a person: If he dreams that he was imprisoned for matters related to religion, this indicates his faith. A dream in which the ruler puts you in prison means that you You will be affected by stress and misery. In a married man’s dream, this means that a woman with a difficult temperament will make his life hell. It indicates silence, hiding secrets and secrets that you know nothing about. Interpretation of seeing a prisoner: If the person is sick, prison means the grave. It indicates extreme poverty and destitution. And the need of people. Al-Nabulsi said that it is a sign of meeting loved ones after a long absence. If the dreamer is in good health and has no problems, this means longevity. Interpretation of a dream about prison in a dream Contemporary psychologists argue that prison means that a person is experiencing severe distress. The interpretation of a dream is no different. Prison is different from the interpretation of a prisoner or an ordinary person, as they both feel upset and stressed. The interpretation of seeing a prisoner is a sign that a person feels very lonely. Introverted or depressed people often have these dreams. Prison in a dream indicates your feeling of loneliness and symbolizes the psychological prison within you. Dream Interpretation of Visiting a PrisonerIf someone is in prison and dreams that a loved one is visiting him, this is good news for you, it means that you will actually be acquitted and released, or it means that you will be released. Previous imprisonment for reasons such as good behavior and behavior. Seeing someone you love imprisoned in a dream indicates that above the collar face, this person is going through a difficult time, but he

title: Interpretation of a dream about a boil on the leg or thigh

preview.html: The boil contains a lot of pus and causes swelling and high temperature, and seeing it in a dream varies between good and bad. Interpretation of a dream about a boil on the leg: There is no doubt that the foot is the organ responsible for people’s movement and effort. Seeing a boil on the leg in a dream indicates the fortuneteller’s health. As explained by his diligence and research on Money to take care of his or her family. As for the appearance of a boil on a woman’s leg, it indicates her stress and effort in supporting her husband and children. It can indicate happiness and psychological comfort with her husband. As for seeing heavy boils and the failure of attempts to treat them on the leg, it is a sign of the failure of relationships or failure to earn a living. As explained by problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream about a boil on the thigh When a person dreams of seeing a boil on the thigh, this is a sign of livelihood and making it easier to obtain. It symbolizes the vision of making money on a journey. The vision indicates commitment, success, and obtaining a suitable job for an unmarried girl. The dream of a boil on a woman’s thigh For a married woman, it is a sign of prosperity and stability with her husband and children. It may indicate mutual respect between spouses. The meaning of a dream about a boil on the head When a person dreams that a boil appears on his head in the dream, it shows that he is a very thoughtful person. It also indicates that he is patient and waits before making important decisions in his life. The vision shows the attention of the fortuneteller. People from Around him and thinking about their interests and circumstances. As for those who suffer from problems and worries and saw a boil on the head with the application of cream for treatment and treatment, it indicates the end of problems, the end of anxiety, and a feeling of psychological comfort. Interpretation of seeing boils on the feet: Whoever dreams of having boils on his feet, this is a direct sign of abundance. It means good health for the viewer. It symbolizes abundance. Money is a lawful livelihood. It states that the dreamer is distinguished by diplomacy in dealing with others and enjoying their love. It also indicates the beautiful woman in a man’s life. Not treating the boil indicates suffering, distress, loss of money, and paralysis of the woman. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond. And we explain it.

title: Learn about the interpretation of the hyena in a dream by great scholars

preview.html: The hyena is a predatory animal and eats meat in addition to being very fast, so it is easy to reach its prey and it has a very strong sense of smell and hearing, so seeing this animal in a dream causes fear, anxiety and anxiety. Increasing their curiosity to search for what clues and meanings the vision brings, and today we will discuss the most important interpretations of seeing a hyena in a dream for unmarried, pregnant, and divorced women. Hyena in a dream Seeing a hyena is one of the unwanted visions that indicate that the dreamer will suffer serious harm in the coming days. The obstacles and machinations that are planned against him, except that he is wise enough to face the crises that appear in his life. The interpretation of a woman’s dream of a hyena is evidence that she is not loved in her social environment, while whoever dreams of eating hyena meat is evidence that he is exposed to magic and sorcery. A hyena in a dream indicates that the dreamer is far from the path of Almighty God and is not devoted to religious teachings. Whoever dreams of drinking hyena’s milk is evidence that the viewer is being betrayed by those around him, and the proximity of the hyena to the man indicates the presence of a hearing-impaired woman approaching him and trying to trap him, so it is so. . It is important to be careful. As for someone who dreams that a hyena might attack him, this indicates that the path is full of difficulties and obstacles and he will not be able to easily reach what he wants. Hyenas that attack a woman are a symbol of her exposure to the hatred and envy of those around her. The hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing a fight with a hyena and the end of the fight with the dreamer remaining is evidence that he will escape from a problem he faced against his will. As for the one who dreams of taming a hyena, this indicates that he is distinguished by a degree High intelligence, so it is easy to take revenge on anyone who tries to harm him. Seeing more than one hyena in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies, but God Almighty has given him the strength to be able to confront all his enemies. Whoever dreams of being in a place full of hyenas, the dream indicates that he is sleeping with people associated with magic, sorcery, and harming innocent people. Hyena in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq: A hyena in a man’s dream, whose life is filled with many social and professional relationships, indicates that he will lose many important things in his life. Imam Al-Sadiq confirmed that hyenas in a dream refer to women. However, if a single man sees in a dream that he is sitting next to a hyena, this is evidence that a disreputable girl is close to him and he will love her and marry her, then his life will become hell. A female hyena in his bed is an indication of the presence of people who are trying in various ways to disrupt the dreamer’s work. A hyena in a dream for an unmarried woman. As for someone who dreams that someone he knows in reality has the head of a hyena, then this It indicates that the person has the head of a hyena. He hates her and tries to harm her in any way. Many hyenas in one dream, but I was able to kill them is a sign that God Almighty will expel all evil from her and give her enough strength to overcome all the crises of her life. preview.text: The hyena is a predatory animal and eats meat in addition to being very fast, so it is easy to reach its prey and it has a very strong sense of smell and hearing, so seeing this animal in a dream causes fear, anxiety and anxiety. Increasing their curiosity to search for what clues and meanings the vision brings, and today we will discuss the most important interpretations of seeing a hyena in a dream for unmarried, pregnant, and divorced women. Hyena in a dream Seeing a hyena is one of the unwanted visions that indicate that the dreamer will suffer serious harm in the coming days. The obstacles and machinations that are planned against him, except that he is wise enough to face the crises that appear in his life. The interpretation of a woman’s dream of a hyena is evidence that she is not loved in her social environment, while whoever dreams of eating hyena meat is evidence that he is exposed to magic and sorcery. A hyena in a dream indicates that the dreamer is far from the path of Almighty God and is not devoted to religious teachings. Whoever dreams of drinking hyena’s milk is evidence that the viewer is being betrayed by those around him, and the proximity of the hyena to the man indicates the presence of a hearing-impaired woman approaching him and trying to trap him, so it is so. . It is important to be careful. As for someone who dreams that a hyena might attack him, this indicates that the path is full of difficulties and obstacles and he will not be able to easily reach what he wants. Hyenas that attack a woman are a symbol of her exposure to the hatred and envy of those around her. The hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing a fight with a hyena and the end of the fight with the dreamer remaining is evidence that he will escape from a problem he faced against his will. As for the one who dreams of taming a hyena, this indicates that he is distinguished by a degree High intelligence, so it is easy to take revenge on anyone who tries to harm him. Seeing more than one hyena in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies, but God Almighty has given him the strength to be able to confront all his enemies. Whoever dreams of being in a place full of hyenas, the dream indicates that he is sleeping with people associated with magic, sorcery, and harming innocent people. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing orange in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the color orange by Ibn SirinNarrated by Ibn Shirin Seeing the color orange in a dream is one of the desired colors to be seen and a sign of a bright life. Also, to see yourself wearing orange clothes in a dream is one of the visions of great money and food that the dreamer will receive. Seeing the color orange in a dream It means that the dreamer will fulfill many of his desires during this period and get what he is looking for. The interpretation of seeing orange clothes in a dream is a sign of losing some important things from the dreamer in his next life. But the dreamer who receives an orange gift in a dream is one of the visions of losing a close person. Water turning orange in a dream is considered one of the dreams that indicate the dreamer’s goodness, benefit and blessings in his life. Interpretation of orange hair in a dream for a single woman When a girl sees her hair orange in a dream, this means that she will obtain many wishes. Likewise, seeing an unmarried woman Wearing an orange dress in a dream means kindness and closeness to those you love is a good thing, God willing. Also, to see in a dream tearing an orange piece of cloth for an unmarried woman for her failure in her life and her loss of important people. The interpretation of seeing buying an orange car in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions and indicates That you will enter days filled with goodness and nourishment. Interpretation of a dream about the color orange for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the color orange in a dream for a married woman about her ability to bear responsibility and gain happiness and joys in her life. Seeing the color orange in a dream for a woman indicates that she and her husband will obtain a lot of money in their next life. A woman who sees her husband wearing orange clothes in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate kindness and transition to a better life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing an orange dress for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman wearing orange clothes in a dream is one of her praiseworthy dreams and a sign of goodness and safety from God. The interpretation of the dream Wearing orange clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that God will give her good and sufficient nutrition in her life. Her dream of arranging orange clothes and fabrics means that she will have an easy and affordable birth. Interpretation of a dream about the color orange for a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing the color orange in a dream for a divorced woman is a sign that she will get rid of Her problems and worries. Seeing the color orange in a divorced woman’s dream means that she will enter a calm and stable life and soon she will get what she wants. Interpretation of a dream about the color of the sky orange: The color of the sky changing from its original color to orange in a dream indicates an improvement in circumstances, an end to problems, and an exit from Distress.Interpretation of seeing an orange car in a dream. Driving an orange car in a dream is one of the visions of getting out of danger and recovering from diseases. Seeing yourself driving an orange car in a dream means that you control affairs, achieve higher goals, and gain prestigious positions. Interpretation of a dream about the moon in orange. Interpretation of seeing the moon in orange indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing viscera in a dream or dreams

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing intestines in a dream: The dream refers to the intestines or intestines of the husband’s and wife’s daughters. Whoever dreams that he sees his intestines outside his stomach in a dream, and he is married to a woman who was married before him, this is a sign of that. Her daughters are from the previous husband. The vision may indicate saving money in the bank that is not Someone knows him. The vision also means that the parents are leaving the house. Seeing the intestines coming out of the stomach in a dream. Whoever sees the intestines coming out in a dream indicates the engagement of the daughter. Interpretation scholars have agreed that courage symbolizes money, so whoever sees his intestines coming out is a sign of the appearance of his money or .. Penetrating the secret. The meaning of eating a bone in a dream. When someone dreams of eating guts, and others dream about him, this is evidence that he is eating an orphan’s money. As for the one who eats a lot of intestines, it is clear that he will be afflicted with many treasures in the past. The poor person, whoever sees it hurts his stomach, and the guts coming out of him will show a lot of money on its way to him. Seeing the intestines or something coming out of the stomach. When a person sees something coming out of the intestines or all of the intestines from his stomach and returning to him or not, it is a sign. Death. God knows best. As for someone who cuts the stomach of another, it is a manifestation of competition and disagreement between them. The ruler takes out the intestines for the people in a dream. When the ruler dreams that his intestines are dead, they came out in front of the world. It is A sign that he is an unjust ruler who eats people’s money. If his intestines return to his stomach again, this is a sign of continuing injustice and unity. And if he no longer refers to it, return the money to the people. The meaning of an incision in the abdomen in a dream When someone dreams that he cut his stomach and did not find any intestines in it, which indicates the illness of his children and the destruction of the house If the fortuneteller is sick, he blows his stomach and finds it empty, then this is his dream. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about peace in a dream by leading interpreters

preview.html: Seeing peace in a dream symbolizes different meanings, most of which are beneficial to the dreamer, especially for a single girl and a pregnant woman. The meaning of peace in a dream varies depending on the dreamer. The knife in a dream has many symbols that are determined according to the symbols and other details that accompany it in the dream. The interpretation of dreams also varies. The knife depends In the dream about the different situation of the pioneer and the circumstances and events that he is experiencing in his life. Interpretation of the dream of peace in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Muhammad bin Sirin spoke about seeing peace in a dream in some detail. Ibn Sirin was interested in interpreting the dream calmly according to the details that come to the vision that reveal the meaning of the dream Its purpose. Ibn Sirin mentioned that the symbol of calm in a dream could indicate marriage, the birth of a male child, an argument for someone who was worried or oppressed, or power and influence. Therefore, the dream interpreter must know all the details of the accompanying vision to be able to determine the exact meaning. For interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about peace in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpreters in the old saying tend to see a knife in a dream for an unmarried girl and an unmarried young man as a praiseworthy vision of goodness. Interpreters believe that using peace in a dream is a clear indication of the marriage of single men and women. This interpretation came from Some of the most prominent dream interpreters, such as Imam Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, who stated in his interpretation that the one who “benefited,” that is, the one who used a knife in his sleep, got married. Some commentators argued that seeing a knife in a girl’s hands without using it indicates that she is in love with a famous man in the world. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: “If a woman sees that she is carrying a knife or gives one of the women a knife, this indicates her love for famous men.” Interpretation A dream of peace for a pregnant woman. The majority of dream interpreters agree with the statement that peace in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the good and promising visions for a safe pregnancy and her fetus. The ancient dreamers unanimously agreed in their books that the appearance of a knife in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the safety of the child. The view of commentators on this is that the knife is for protection And whoever appears to him in a dream has resorted to God’s power for what he fears or fears harming him. Some dream interpretation sheikhs have a different opinion regarding dreaming of a knife in a dream than a pregnant woman, as they say that in the dream there is an indication that she is pregnant with a male child if she does not know the gender. The fetus after. Imam Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi supports this interpretation, “The knife in the dream is a male child.” Calmness in a dream for a divorced woman. Likewise, the majority of dream interpreters believe that seeing a knife in a dream for a divorced woman is a good vision for her. According to the Mutawatir interpretation of dreams in saying, the appearance of serenity There are many benefits in a dream for a divorced woman. It has been said: The meaning of peace in a dream for a divorced woman is earning money, and they differed in the amount and value of this money. It has been said: The symbol of calm in a dream for a divorced woman is the superiority of her argument over the argument of her ex-husband, or her victory over him, or her victory. In a dispute. In all cases, commentators see that the knife in the dream

title: Interpretation of dreams: My mother bewitched me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother enchanted me in a dream. We will present below the interpretation of a dream about my mother enchanted me in a dream and what does all this mean and more details that interest you and is it also good or bad? Interpretation of dreams: My mother enchanted me in a dream. Interpretation of my mother enchanted me in a dream. Interpretation of my mother enchanted me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing magic can lead to disturbance, and God knows the unseen. When you see magic in a dream, it can be evidence of a violation of religion, and God knows best. Just as the dreamer sees magic in a dream, it may express agitation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about parents traveling In a dream, interpretation of a dream about parents traveling In a dream, travel can refer to different meanings. Also, seeing travel can indicate good changes and that God has knowledge of the unseen, so if the dreamer sees travel, it may indicate meeting strangers, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees travel, it can be a sign On changes and new things, and God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother returning from a trip in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother returning from a trip in a dream. Perhaps returning from a trip means the disappearance of sadness and anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees someone returning from a trip, this may indicate achieving goals. And God knows best. When you see a return from a trip in a dream, it could be a sign of changes and a return to the state in which the dreamer was, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees himself returning from a trip in a dream, this may indicate that he will be freed from sadness, and God knows all that he did not see. Interpretation of a dream about my mother, her hair is close in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother, her hair is short in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for seeing this except that seeing short hair can lead to bad news, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees short and fair hair in a dream, this may indicate problems, and God knows all that is not If a young man sees short, straight hair, it may be good and strong, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of wearing the niqab in a dream. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of wearing the niqab in a dream can lead to kindness and livelihood, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream a woman wearing the niqab, this may indicate success. And God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a woman wearing the niqab in a dream, it may represent justice and purity, and God knows all the unseen. If the dreamer sees a woman wearing the niqab, this may be evidence of concealment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my mother who told me that you will not get married in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother who told me that you will not get married. Get married in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations for you to see this. However, seeing a refusal to marry in a dream could be a sign of psychological problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Just as an unmarried girl sees in a dream a refusal to marry, this may indicate acceptance, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees He refuses to marry and cried in a dream. This may be good news, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my mother telling me that I am pregnant in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my mother telling me that I am pregnant in a dream could express a strong relationship, and God knows best.
